languages.text: Обучение серфов грамоте и воспитание просвещенных слуг под присмотром монахов — затея равно полезная и опасная.
To teach the serfs to read, and thus produce educated servants under the supervision of monks, would be as useful as it would be dangerous.
languages.original_text: Обучение серфов грамоте и воспитание просвещенных слуг под присмотром монахов — затея равно полезная и опасная.

traits.locale_text: To teach the serfs to read, and thus educate enlightened servants under the supervision of monks, would be as useful as it would be dangerous.
It is possible to teach the serfs to read and educate enlightened servants under the supervision of monks.
To teach the serfs to read, and thus produce educated servants under the supervision of monks, would be as useful as it would be dangerous.
It is possible to teach the serfs to read, and thus educate enlightened servants under the supervision of monks.
To teach the serfs to read, and thus educate enlightened servants under the supervision of monks, would be as useful as it would be dangerous.
To teach the serfs to read, and thus produce educated servants under the supervision of monks, would be as useful as it would be dangerous.
To teach the serfs to read, and thus produce educated servants under the supervision of monks, would be as useful as it would be dangerous.

languages.text: Il est possible d'enseigner la lecture aux serfs et ainsi d'éduquer des serviteurs éclairés sous la supervision des moines, mais cela pourrait avoir des conséquences désastreuses.
languages.original_text: To teach the serfs to read, and thus produce educated servants under the supervision of monks, would be as useful as it would be dangerous.

traits.locale_text: Il est possible d'enseigner la lecture aux serfs et ainsi d'éduquer des serviteurs éclairés sous la supervision des moines, mais cela pourrait avoir des conséquences désastreuses.

languages.text: 農奴に読むことを教え、修道士の監督下で教育を受けた使用人を生み出すことは、有益であると同時に危険でもある。
languages.original_text: To teach the serfs to read, and thus produce educated servants under the supervision of monks, would be as useful as it would be dangerous.

traits.locale_text: 農奴に読むことを教え、修道士の監督下で教育を受けた使用人を生み出すことは、有益であると同時に危険でもある。

languages.text: 您的王朝可以教导仆役读书识字，在僧侣的监督下培养出受过教育的仆人。这种做法既对王朝有益，同时又充满风险。
languages.original_text: To teach the serfs to read, and thus produce educated servants under the supervision of monks, would be as useful as it would be dangerous.

traits.locale_text: 您的王朝可以教导仆役读书识字，在僧侣的监督下培养出受过教育的仆人。这种做法既对王朝有益，同时又充满风险。

languages.text: Enseñar a los siervos a leer, produciendo sirvientes educados bajo la supervisión de los monjes, es tan práctico como peligroso.
languages.original_text: To teach the serfs to read, and thus produce educated servants under the supervision of monks, would be as useful as it would be dangerous.

traits.locale_text: Enseñar a los siervos a leer, produciendo sirvientes educados bajo la supervisión de los monjes, es tan práctico como peligroso.

languages.text: Den Sklaven das Lesen beizubringen und dadurch erleuchtete Diener unter der Aufsicht und Führung von Mönchen auszubilden wäre ebenso nützlich wie gefährlich.
languages.original_text: To teach the serfs to read, and thus produce educated servants under the supervision of monks, would be as useful as it would be dangerous.

traits.locale_text: Den Sklaven das Lesen beizubringen und dadurch erleuchtete Diener unter der Aufsicht und Führung von Mönchen auszubilden wäre ebenso nützlich wie gefährlich.

languages.text: Kölelere okuma öğretmek ve böylece keşişlerin gözetiminde eğitimli hizmetkârlar yetiştirmek, faydalı olduğu kadar tehlike de teşkil edecektir.
languages.original_text: To teach the serfs to read, and thus produce educated servants under the supervision of monks, would be as useful as it would be dangerous.
